visible_toggle_sprint.visible_toggle_spr:
§6§u§lState Only§r - Shows the indicator when you are in the sprinting state
§6§u§lKey Only§r - Shows the indicator when you pressing the sprint key (Or it's toggled on)
§6§u§lCombined§r - Shows the indicator when you pressing the key or are in the sprinting state

§6§u§lState Only§r - Shows the indicator when you are in the sneaking state
§6§u§lKey Only§r - Shows the indicator when you pressing the sneak key (Or it's toggled on)
§6§u§lCombined§r - Shows the indicator when you pressing the key or are in the sneaking state
